channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump threatens Insurrection Act for Minnesota
item.description: President Trump on Thursday threatened to deploy U.S. military forces under the Insurrection Act to Minneapolis if state officials don't stop protests...

item.title: Exclusive: Bipartisan plan in Congress aims to create U.S. reserve for critical minerals
item.description: A bipartisan group of lawmakers will introduce new legislation Thursday to establish a $2.5 billion "Strategic Resilience Reserve" (SRR) for critical ...

item.title: Exclusive: Chamber of Commerce chief on America's "hinge point"
item.description: The United States faces a fork in the road in which it can either embrace dynamic capitalism or tolerate stagnation, the leader of America's biggest b...

item.title: Behind the Curtain: The job replacement AI machine
item.description: There's little evidence AI is destroying large numbers of white-collar jobs today. But five developments show the potential for massive future job and...

item.title: The AI apocalypse isn't here yet. It's changing our jobs
item.description: Instead of putting people out of work, AI is mostly helping them do their jobs, finds a new study from Anthropic, the maker of Claude, an AI model pop...

item.title: Native Americans are being swept up by ICE in Minneapolis, tribes say
item.description: Tribal leaders say Indigenous people have been stopped, questioned, harassed and, in some cases, detained solely on the basis of their skin color or n...

item.title: House Democrats aren’t eager to impeach Trump. But that could change.
item.description: For now, few are pressing the case for a third Trump impeachment. The calculus could shift if the party regains the majority after the midterm electio...

item.title: Democrats launch campaign for Virginia voters to join redistricting fight
item.description: A new group will raise money to mobilize voters for a proposed redistricting amendment as Democrats try to counter GOP-led efforts ahead of the midter...

item.title: Journalists confront new reality in reporting after FBI raid
item.description: Many saw the FBI search of a Washington Post reporter’s home as a jarring new step aimed at limiting their ability to gather information.

item.title: Democratic lawmakers say they’re under investigation for military orders video
item.description: “It’s legal intimidation and physical intimidation meant to get you to shut up,” said Sen. Elissa Slotkin, who organized the video on disobeying illeg...

item.title: Capitol agenda: Trump tests GOP with Fed probe
Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
